question:
With regards to the recent observation of the 75th anniversary of the Liberation of Auschwitz, consider the following about this WW-II concentration camp:
  1. It is located in Germany.
  2. It is a UNESCO World Heritage Site.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Statement 1 is incorrect: The Auschwitz Concentration Camp is located in Poland. It is the largest of the half a dozen concentration camps used by Nazi Germany to murder Jews and other ethnic minorities. It was liberated on 27th of January 1945 by the Red Army soldiers of the Soviet Union. Statement 2 is correct: The Auschwitz Concentration Camp was designated as a UN World Heritage Site in 1979. It is now regarded as the Auschwitz Memorial- a symbol of the Holocaust history from WW-II. In 1947, the Polish government set up the Auschwitz-Birkenau State Museum at this site.
